text: Chitatabꞌej chi we jun kꞌambꞌejabꞌal noꞌj riꞌ: Kꞌo jun achi, ajchoqꞌe jun ulew, xutik nikꞌaj uvas. Xutzꞌapij, xukꞌot jun nimalaj jul, xuyak jun nimalaj ja jawjeꞌ kekꞌojiꞌ wi chajil taq rech ri tikoꞌn, xuya kanoq pa qajik chike nikꞌaj winaq, kꞌa te riꞌ xeꞌ chubꞌanik jun utaqkil pa jun tinimit chik.
